alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 5:40PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CHEYENNE AND MORRILL COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM MDT... At 440 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 13 miles west of Crescent Lake National Wildlife Refuge to near The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92 to near Potter. Movement was north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Potter, Dalton, Gurley, Brownson, Northport, The Intersection Of Highway 385 And 92, Court House And Jail Rocks, Bridgeport State Recreation Area, Redington and Broadwater. This includes Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 38 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
